title: Exquisite Diamond Floral Haaram with Emerald Centerpiece & South Sea Pearl Drop
materials: set with meticulously chosen Diamonds (SI Clarity
G-H Color). Features a captivating Emerald (1.08cts) and lustrous South Sea Pearl (10.00cts).
features: This two-tier Haaram showcases a delicate floral motif throughout, expertly crafted with prong-set diamonds to maximize brilliance. The centerpiece features a vibrant Emerald, surrounded by diamond petals, leading to a graceful South Sea Pearl drop. The 'flower' locket weights 0.662 gms, contains 1.38 ct ruby, 1.08ct eme, and 3.95ct moti.
colors: with a striking contrast provided by the vibrant green emerald and the soft pearl luminescence. The golden hue accentuates the brilliance of the diamonds and emerald.
occasions: and other special occasions. An ideal choice for muhurtham or a grand function. Also suitable for elegant evening events where you want to make a sophisticated statement.
description: This Haaram is a stunning fusion of traditional design and modern aesthetics. The meticulously set diamonds create a breathtaking sparkle, while the emerald and pearl add a touch of timeless elegance. A testament to fine craftsmanship and enduring style, this piece is sure to become a treasured heirloom.
